title: Free Market Capitalist
author: Free Market Capitalist
content: I don't know if any old user has responded to this already but I have searched and can't see anything about it. In the Service Announcements section I see the threads as sorted in a way that I don't know what it is, but it is not by the last post published as it happens to me in the rest of the sections of the forum:In the other sections the threads appear in order of publication of the last post. Let's see Bitcoin Discussion for example:Any idea why this happens?

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: This has been the case for quite some time now[1]. It's because of the bump option (see the top right when visiting a service announcement thread)[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5183553.0

But still, thanks for this useful piece of information. I think the matter is resolved now.

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: If you want or to see only the new or the latest post that was written in a board just write that behind the Link of the board.Code:;sort=first_post;descFor Example ,for the Altcoins Ann Board it would be like looking that:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=159.0;sort=first_post;descNow you see only the new post that was made there.
